rows.label: tev001011_MSG0010
rows.name:
Just as I thought we might get some
peace... How long does the violence
have to go on for?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001011_MSG0020
rows.name:
...No use thinking about it too much,
I guess. Now's the time for action.
Do you need my help?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001011_MSG0050
rows.name:
All right then, I'll fight by your side.
If the universe won't give us peace,
we'll just have to grasp it ourselves.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001011_MSG0080
rows.name:
No worries. I'll stay on call though,
just in case anything happens.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001011_MSG0090
rows.name:
Hey... Phew, am I glad
you finally found me...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001011_MSG0100
rows.name:
I know that in situations like this, SOP
dictates we ought to stay put, but I was
crawling out of my skin with worry here...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001011_MSG0110
rows.name:
Anyway, that's all in the past now.
We've rendezvoused, that's all that matters.
That, and getting the heck out of Dodge...[ST:wait ]
